nodes.description: 周五在Maiduguri附近村庄发生女性自杀式袭击，6名袭击者引爆导致55人死亡
nodes.support_text: In a village near the group's stronghold of Maiduguri, 55 people died when six allegedly female suicide bombers blew themselves up on Friday.

nodes.description: 周日Potiskum救赎基督教教会遭炸弹袭击，4人当场死亡，1人稍后不治
nodes.support_text: Authorities have said the bomber entered the Redeemed Christian Church of God in the city of Potiskum just before 10 a.m. local time on Sunday, before detonating their explosives.

nodes.description: 同一周内博尔诺州发生系列袭击，致200人死亡（清真寺、村庄、集市）
nodes.support_text: In the neighboring state of Borno, more than 200 people lost their lives in Islamist assaults on mosques, villages and markets.

nodes.description: 博科圣地自5月底起加大暴力行动，旨在反驳新总统布哈里反恐承诺
nodes.support_text: Boko Haram has stepped up its violent campaign since the end of May, determined to prove wrong the country's newly elected President Muhammadu Buhari who vowed to end the six-year insurgency.

nodes.description: 尼日利亚军方声明自布哈里政府成立后未出现恐怖分子控制领土
nodes.support_text: The army boasts that 'since the emergence of the new administration of President Muhammadu Buhari no single territory in Nigeria is being occupied or proclaimed by the terrorists as their 'caliphate' even as their leaders are either being killed, captured or on the run.'

nodes.description: 尼日利亚与尼日尔、乍得、喀麦隆四国联合打击极端组织
nodes.support_text: Nigeria, along with Niger, Chad and Cameroon have joined forces to drive the extremists out of their respective countries.

nodes.description: 法国总统奥朗德在喀麦隆表示准备与西非国家召开反恐峰会
nodes.support_text: During a visit to Cameroon earlier in the week, French President Francois Hollande said he was prepared to hold a summit with leaders to support them in their fight against Boko Haram.

nodes.description: 布哈里发言人宣布将实施跨国反恐战略，同时表明愿与博科圣地谈判
nodes.support_text: Femi Adesina, a spokesman for Buhari's office, said on Saturday that a multinational strategy to 'devastate and decapitate' the insurgency would soon be put into action.

nodes.description: 布哈里计划斋月结束后访问喀麦隆并与奥巴马讨论反恐议题
nodes.support_text: Nigeria's leader is scheduled to travel to Cameroon after the end of the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, then he will meet with US President Barack Obama where Boko Haram will be an important point of discussions.

nodes.description: 新任总统穆罕默德·布哈里承诺结束六年内战
nodes.support_text: 新任总统穆罕默德·布哈里承诺结束六年内战

nodes.description: 四国驱赶极端分子出境

nodes.description: 尼日利亚领导人讨论博科圣地问题

edges.support_text: In the neighboring state of Borno, more than 200 people lost their lives in Islamist assaults on mosques, villages and markets.
炸弹袭击者进入教堂后，警察向AFP报道事件
Authorities have said the bomber entered the Redeemed Christian Church of God in the city of Potiskum just before 10 a.m. local time on Sunday, before detonating their explosives.

The army boasts that 'since the emergence of the new administration of President Muhammadu Buhari no single territory in Nigeria is being occupied or proclaimed by the terrorists as their 'caliphate' even as their leaders are either being killed, captured or on the run.'
Nigeria, along with Niger, Chad and Cameroon have joined forces to drive the extremists out of their respective countries.
军方声明后恐怖分子继续试图占领领土
During a visit to Cameroon earlier in the week, French President Francois Hollande said he was prepared to hold a summit with leaders to support them in their fight against Boko Haram.
Femi Adesina, a spokesman for Buhari's office, said on Saturday that a multinational strategy to 'devastate and decapitate' the insurgency would soon be put into action.
警察向AFP报道事件后，警察陈述受害者名单
布哈里政府成立后，博科圣地加大暴力行动以反驳其承诺
占领行动导致领导人被杀害
俘获后四国实施驱赶行动
